biography: Joakim, a golfer of unknown home club, is known for his quiet intensity on the course. While some might perceive him as reserved, those who know him well understand that his focus is a testament to his deep passion for the game.

He has appeared once in past Hector Trophée events and is still active in Hector events. While he will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility of a last-minute change always remains.

Despite not having secured a Hector Trophée victory or an individual Victor trophy to date, Joakim's dedication and strategic approach suggest that he remains a formidable contender in future tournaments.
